ygData.subject: Jewelcrafting and the Enchanters Role in Norath!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all My name is Dymond and I play a DE Enchanter on E ci.......I just recently made 8th lvl and acquired my EVER so desired Enchant Silver spell......I have
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all

My name is Dymond and I play a DE Enchanter on E'ci.......I just
recently made 8th lvl and acquired my EVER so desired Enchant Silver
spell......I have put 15 pnts into jewelcrafting and have an extra 10 or so
points to put into my other skills to max them out......I have acquired a
full suit of cloth and intend on taking a couple different chars to Upper
Guk this weekend as to acquire sum mage specific armor but I am interested
in a few topics of hot discussion......I have heard alot about the Enchanter
and what they can do but one thing I notice is the choice of spells we have
and that most of them are either debuffers or animation controlling
spells.....in other words spells that control the NPCs actions.......so my
first question is one of strategy......do you ppl have a certain line of
spells that you cast first, second,
third?......soloing?......grouped?......I play a 16th lvl Druid as well and
his main role in a group is to scout and fetch as we have tracking and a
good number of buff spells.....so in a group with him Im used to being in
the thick of it from teh beginning and eventually fading into the melee or
just being the CALL BOY......back line guy calling orders and
directions......so my point to this is just what role dus the enchanter play
aside from controlling the frenzy?......dmg?....or is this more of a silent
bak line char?.......no realy power, no realy damage......but in large
groups and dungeoning where there are multiple targets we become the
MAESTRO!!!>.......and SECOND!!!......as I stated in the beginning I have put
a good portion of sum starting points into Jewelcrafting and would like ANY
and all information on this subject......even if you think its CRAP and just
small stuff that you have found yourself but dusnt relaly make all the
differnece.....TELL ME!!!>.....these are the small points that make you
stick out......Id like to have any replies to either of these questions
either by reply or by posting to this list.......ANY AND ALL INFO
WANTED!!!!!!



Dymond the Enchantress
